Plot: Listening length: 5 hours, 35 minutes As Vampire Queen Betsy Taylor approaches the big 3-1 (in human years, that is), she has a lot on her plate. There are wedding plans to finalize, with no help from her fiance Eric. And Betsy's decided to stop drinking blood, something Eric, the vampire king, may not understand... So when some guests show up uninvited, and they happen to be the powerful European vampires who have finally come to pay their respects the week before her birthday, Betsy gets really cranky...
Characters: Tina, Elizabeth "Betsy" Taylor, Eric Sinclair, Garret Shea aka George, Antonia Wolfton, Dr. Marc Spangler, Jessica Watson, Laura Goodman (Undead)
